overview:
David Black is a serial entrepreneur and the Chief Visionary Officer and co-founder of SocialMadeSimple. He is responsible for financial operations, content creation and HR. David has spent his career finding ways to more effectively deliver quality real estate and mortgage services through the use of technology.

Prior to co-founding SocialMadeSimple, David founded LoanBright.com, a privately held company that enables mortgage companies to capture and close more business via marketing and software tools, where he continues to serve as Managing Director. Prior to founding LoanBright.com, David founded First New England Mortgage, a leading mortgage brokerage serving Massachusetts, New England and numerous other parts of the United States since 1987, where he still serves as President.
